entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY

LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
